title: Coca Bag, possibly 1200–1500
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes; warp selvage for bag opening
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor in memory of Alexander M. Bing
description: Small flat bag woven in stripes of red, black, and brown. Hand stitched at sides with red wool to form bag.
